view.name: system, basic, detailed, video, grid, gamecarousel

text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: The SuFami Turbo, often compared to the Aladdin Deck Enhancer, is an accessory released by Bandai for Nintendo's Super Famicom system and was released in 1996.

text.name: TextDescShort
text.text: The SuFami Turbo, often compared to the Aladdin Deck Enhancer, is an accessory released by Bandai for Nintendo's Super Famicom system.
